The correct answer is C: [00:03:36 - 00:05:01]. 

In this segment of the audio, the speaker can be heard saying "it's a nice four-point muley shed" and "my first mule deer shed," indicating that they have found a shed and are excited about it. The description also mentions that the camera reveals a lone antler in dry grass, which is then picked up and shown in hand. Therefore, option C, [00:03:36 - 00:05:01], is the correct answer as it corresponds to the time frame when these events are described in the audio.

The correct answer is B: [00:05:01 - 00:05:13]. 

In this segment of the video, the viewer sees a close-up shot of camo boots resting on dry grass. This is followed by the on-screen text "3 hours later," indicating that some time has passed since the initial shot. The speaker then mentions that his feet have bad blisters from new boots and that they are fried. Another voice also chimes in, saying "Listen." Therefore, the relevant time segment for these events is between 00:05:01 and 00:05:13.
